attributes.action: Allow learner drivers to practise driving in England. (With members from bubble)
attributes.additional_details: I have been driving as a learner for more than a year, my driving test has been cancelled more than 5 times, I can understand why this has happened and understand it is due to compromising the safety of others. However, to now be told that I am prohibited from practicing my driving is despicable. Driving in your own car with members from your house hold engenders no danger and compromises no ones personal safety as you are not mixing bubbles.
attributes.background: Currently, you can only practise driving with members of your household or support bubble in Scotland and Wales. The government website states that you cannot practice driving in England at all.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559063

Under current Government guidance, you can practise driving with members of your household or support bubble. It must be travel for work, education or other essential journeys: https://www.gov.uk/driving-lessons-learning-to-drive/practising-with-family-or-friends
